schemaVersion.description: The version of the schema defining a blocklist resource.

groupId.description: GroupId of the blocklisted artifact. It must be a valid groupId (corresponding to a G of a Maven GAV)

artifactId.description: ArtifactId of the blocklisted artifact. It must be either a valid artifactId (corresponding to a A of a Maven GAV) or the * character to represent any artifactId

versions.description: List of blocklisted versions of the artifact.
